name: Moon Bird VR
description:
Be the first bird travelling across cosmic galaxies. Prepare to work hard to get as far as you can by flapping your wings. Enjoy picturesque scenery of distant planets, but be aware of scarce air supply.
Control your flight with simple HMD tilt control and flapping your wings to catch as much precious air balloons as you can or your bird will vanish in such a harsh environment.
